trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Defines the delegate for the <see cref="E:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Define o delegado para o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles" /> da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventHandler> delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventHandler> delegado é definido para o <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> evento o <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> classe.

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application as shown in the example for this topic.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar o <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> evento o <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> classe no arquivo global. asax para seu aplicativo ASP.NET, conforme mostrado no exemplo deste tópico.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventHandler> to replace the creation of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> with your own custom object.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventHandler> para substituir a criação do <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> objeto o <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> com seu próprio objeto personalizado.

trans-unit.source: To do this, define a delegate using the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventHandler> and assign it to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.
trans-unit.target: Para fazer isso, defina um delegado usando o <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerEventHandler> e atribuí-la para o <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> eventos do <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: A exemplo a seguir mostra o <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> evento incluído no arquivo global asax para um aplicativo ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event adds a trace notification for an application where trace is enabled in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> evento adiciona uma notificação de rastreamento para um aplicativo em que o rastreamento está habilitado no arquivo Web. config.
